fields.summary: Android: ImageView: Sometimes images can not show because getInputStream() fails

comments.body:
Image in row 2 is displayed everytime now.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130314163255
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.2.201302151605
Device: Samsung GALAXY Note (2.3.6) and Nexus 7 Android 4.1
added testcase in Test suite under Imageview.
